title: Paid Ads Specialist
job_overview:
As a Paid Ads Specialist, you will be responsible for developing, executing, and optimizing paid advertising campaigns across multiple platforms (Facebook, Google Ads, Instagram, TikTok, etc.). You will manage the entire paid ads strategy, from campaign creation and execution to performance analysis and budget optimization. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience running successful paid campaigns for e-commerce brands and the ability to drive growth through paid media.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and manage paid advertising campaigns across platforms such as Meta (Facebook, Instagram) and TikTok.

Conduct keyword research and competitor analysis to inform campaign strategy and improve ROI.

Create and test ad copy, visuals, and targeting to maximize campaign performance.

Monitor, analyze, and report on campaign performance, making data-driven adjustments to ensure optimal results.

Optimize ad campaigns for cost-effectiveness, improving cost-per-click (CPC) and cost-per-acquisition (CPA).

Collaborate with the creative team to develop engaging ad creatives and optimize landing pages.

Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in digital advertising and e-commerce.

Ensure that all campaigns are aligned with overall business goals and marketing objectives.

Manage the advertising budget to ensure a high return on investment (ROI).

Create regular reports on ad campaign performance and provide insights to improve future campaigns.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a Paid Ads Specialist or similar role in the e-commerce industry.

Strong knowledge of digital advertising platforms, including Facebook Ads, Google Ads, Instagram Ads, and TikTok Ads.

Proficiency in using Google Analytics, Facebook Ads Manager, and other advertising tools.

Experience with A/B testing, audience targeting, and conversion rate optimization (CRO).

Solid understanding of key performance metrics (CPC, CPA, ROI, etc.) and ability to analyze campaign data to drive decisions.

Experience in optimizing ad campaigns for e-commerce products and driving sales through paid media.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills, especially when working with cross-functional teams.

Detail-oriented with strong problem-solving skills.

Ability to work independently and manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.

How to Apply:
To apply for this position, please include examples of successful paid ad campaigns you have managed. Specifically, share a list of e-commerce brands & stores you previously worked for.  

Applications without this information will not be considered.
